story: Amr Soliman-moustafa shared an event to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: Leading Successful Agile Transformation
caption: Leading Successful Agile Transformation
description:
The 3rd Agile Day: 
Leading Successful Agile Transformation


Saturday, 16th of July, hold at @[399554926810779:274:Holiday-inn Hotel ... City Stars], Cairo, Egypt.


OVERVIEW

This one day is designed to give you an overview about the Agile Transformation Approaches.


MAIN TOPICS

What Agile Really Is? 
Agile Mindset & Context. 
Assessing the need of the Transformation to Agile. 
Definition of Agile Transformation Approaches. 
Decide on the Transformation Approaches and road map. 
Measuring the Transformation progress. 
Agile Project Management. 
Real Transformation Experiences.


PRESENTED BY AGILE PROFESSIONAL COACHES

@[636617910:2048:Ahmet AkdaÄŸ] (Tureky)
@[663316006:2048:Mona Shokrof] (Egypt)

@[468568579888589:274:Agile Turkey]


SPONSORS

@[1422219791331370:274:ACM]
(ACM is a Turkish technology and consultancy company specialized in Agile processes and practices).


WHO SHOULD ATTEND THIS EVENT

Project managers, programme managers, team leaders and anyone interested in agile methodologies.
